Text: Fire!
It's not working!
Grarrr!!!
Uwaaaghh!
Dark knights...attack!
Graarrrr!!!
The knight slices the creature's back.
However...
The wounds begin to heal instantaneously.
What?!
It's...regenerating?!
Grarrr!!!
Nghh!
Damn it!
What in the world is going on?

Iris's red hair swirls behind her as she dashes
through the capital late at night. She was told that
a building had been destroyed. At first, she thought
she'd misheard the news.

But as Iris sprints toward the city, half in
disbelief, her subordinates keep receiving report
after report.

There are many ambushes occurring in the capital
simultaneously.

It doesn't take long for her to reach that
conclusion. But there's nothing logically connecting
the various locations under attack.

Businesses, warehouses, restaurants, private homes of
nobles...

The crimes must be premeditated, but she can't figure
out the goal. That said, the capital has been shaken.

The Knight Order mobilizes in a state of emergency,
and they begin evacuating high-profile leaders. 
Though it's late, curious residents peek from their
windows, many stepping outside for a better look.

Something strange is happening. This is in no way a
normal incident. Iris can sense it.
At that moment a scream reaches her ears.
M-Monster! Help...!

They are shouts from the Knight Order. They aren't
too far away. Iris changes directions and books it
toward the cries for help.

When she turns the corner down a back street to the
main road, she spots the monster.
It's a colossal, hideous beast.

With a swipe of the enormous, blood-soaked
fingernails on its right hand, it transforms the
knights into piles of flesh.
What is that?
Iris mutters as she dashes toward it.
Stand back!
Hyaaahhh!

With one fluid movement, her unsheathed blade
shimmers in the darkness as it slices through the
creature's chest.
Graaarrrr...!
La-Lady Iris...!
Are you hurt?

Iris calls out to the Knight Order as she continues
to eye the wounded creature.
The monster killed eight of our men.

A single hit took them down. Her wine-red eyes
tremble with sorrow when they fall upon the ghastly
corpses.

Everyone who's wounded fall back! Once we evacuate 
this areaâ€”
What?!

Iris looks ahead and sees the wound she had dealt
the creature beginning to heal.
It's regenerating...!

This can't be! Even after that blow Lady Iris dealt
it...!
Graarrrr!!!
All of you stay back!
Iris calls out to the shaken knights.

Its moves are quick, powerful, and heavyâ€” 
but predictable.
If it's going to keep healing itself...

...then I'll just have to slice away at it before it
has a chance to regenerate!
Grarrr!!!
Haaaaahh!!!
